item.description:
Share the joy of living a fantasy no matter what your singing ability is -

let your hair down and have some real fun.

Combine Karaoke with a venue that supports a time to mingle, chat and expand your circle of friends.

We will try to find locations that are not too expensive.

Our main locations will be within Greater New Haven County.

The Organizer will probably not attend Meet Ups beyond this area.

Members beyond Greater New Haven County can send in their

suggestions of locations and days that those locations have Karaoke.

Meet Up E-Mail

karaoke-276@meetup.com

Member participation is encouraged.

If you RSVP Yes and do not attend that

Event that you RSVP Yes for 3 times, then

you can be removed from this Meet Up Group.

You will have 48 hours after the event to contact the host

of the event and or me (if I am not the host) to explain why did you

do that?

If you do not come to this website for more than a year then you could be Removed from this Meet Up site.

 

Mike B

Organizer
item.name: Karaoke Lovers of Greater New Haven .
